text: Deceived is a 1991 American psychological mystery thriller movie directed by Damian Harris and starring Goldie Hawn, John Heard, Robin Bartlett, Ashley Peldon, Beatrice Straight, Tom Irwin, Amy Wright, Kate Reid, Jan Harvey. It was distributed by Touchstone Pictures. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1991 thriller movies Category:1990s mystery movies Category:1990s psychological movies Category:American mystery movies Category:American thriller movies Category:Movies directed by Damian Harris Category:Movies set in New York City Category:Movies set in Toronto
title: Deceived
